name: Attainix Consulting
overview:
Attainix Consulting is a premier provider of advisory services that enable companies to discover, measure and report their Intellectual Capital.

Intellectual Capital has come to represent the major driver of growth in the Information era. According to studies, India is the third largest Intangible economy in the world, since 74% of the total Enterprise value of companies here represent intabgible assets. The USA and Switzerland occupy the top two slots at 75% and 74% respectively.

Traditional accounting fails to capture the true value of intangibles and hence there is a need for companies to use additional mechanisms to measure and report such knowledge assets. Attainix Consulting enables companies to produce IC Reports which can be annexed as a supplement to the annual report.

The ICTracker product developed by Attainix Consulting valuates the intellectual capital of the top 50 Indian companies and reports their true intrinsic worth to investors.
